attributes.action: Make bright disposable vapes 1 colour only.
attributes.additional_details:
Tobacco pouches and cigarettes were changed to a plain colour on 1st December 2012 due to younger people being attracted to the bright colours.

Disposable vapes are extremely bright and do attracted younger people to start vaping because of how they look.

Change the colour of disposable vapes to reduce younger people from buying/starting vaping.
attributes.background: Eliminate colourful disposable vapes and change them to a plain colour as this is attracting younger people to start vaping because they look ''cool''.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/618911
